description: John Hickmott died after a crash involving a blue Ford Fusion, police say.
title: Milton Keynes crash victim's family thank public for support
title_page: Milton Keynes crash victim's family thank public for support - BBC News
maintext:
The family of a man who died after being hit by a car said they were experiencing a "desperately difficult time".
Police believe Jack Hickmott, who was in his 60s, was struck by a blue Ford Fusion in Tongwell Street in Milton Keynes on 19 February.
In a statement, his family thanked "all those who have kindly supported him" over the years and said a private service would be arranged.
Thames Valley Police previously appealed for witnesses or anyone with information to come forward.
